title: 10th National Olive Festival to be held Nov, 2 in Rawalpindi
content:
RAWALPINDI, Nov 01 (APP): The Preparations are in full swing for the 10th National Olive Festival 2025, which will be held on November 2 and 3 at Allama Iqbal Park, Murree Road, Rawalpindi.

The event is being organized by the Parks and Horticulture Authority (PHA) Rawalpindi with support from the Olive Foundation.

According to DGPHA Rawalpindi Ahmed Hasan Ranjha, the National Olive Festival has become a leading platform for promoting olive cultivation, value addition, agribusiness, and sustainable agriculture in Pakistan.

This yearâ€™s event marks the 10th edition of the festival and will honor farmers, researchers, and entrepreneurs who have contributed to making Pakistan more self-reliant in olive production.

The two-day festival will feature an exhibition of olive and agricultural products, awareness sessions, technical demonstrations, stalls, a food court, and family recreational activities. Visitors will also enjoy olive oil tasting competitions and cultural performances.

A large number of farmers, students, and citizens will participate along with representatives from the Ministry of National Food Security and Research, Pakistan Agricultural Research Council (PARC), provincial agriculture departments, and the private sector.
